All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DungeonPanel
extends GamePanel

Author:
tmehdi Class that extends the professor ship class GamePanel. This class is used for the Dungeon panel that is into the DungeonGameFrame.

DungeonPanel

public DungeonPanel(Game game,
                    DataPanel dataPanel,
                    DungeonPanelListener dungeonListener)
Parameters:
game -
dataPanel -
dungeonListener - Call the super constructor and draw the pane. The interface DungeonPanelListener that extends the professor ship interface GamePanelListener is used to make an implementation of the "onMouseMoved" method. It allows us to know in what cell is and make the different actions.
